metadata.title: CVE-2024-42275 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/client: Fix error code in drm_client_buffer_vmap_local()This function accidentally returns zero/success on the failure path.It leads to locking issues and an uninitialized *map_copy in thecaller.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
